Key Match Events: Charlotte Hornets came back from a 18-point deficit to win against the Houston Rockets in the fourth quarter.
LaMelo Ball poured 12 of his 34 points in the fourth quarter to spur the comeback.
Pre-Game Insights: LaMelo Ball returned to the regular season after playing just 22 games in the 2023-24 season.
New head coach Charles Lee wants to build an identity on the defensive side of the ball.
Post-Match Reflections: LaMelo Ball expressed humility and stated that the team needs to compete and play every game like it's their last.
Charles Lee described LaMelo Ball as the 'engine' for this team after securing his first win as head coach.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Charlotte Hornets have won their last four season debut games, the longest active streak in the NBA.
The Hornets rookie had coach secured his first win in a hostile environment on Wednesday night.
